name: You have responded SOLICITOR
body:
Case number: ((reference number))
Applicant: ((applicant name))
Respondent: ((respondent name))
Issue date: ((date of issue))
Your reference: ((solicitor reference))

Dear ((solicitor name)) 

You have filed a response to this ((isDivorce??divorce))((isDissolution??dissolution)) application. You have said you ((isUndisputed??do not)) want to dispute it. 

((isDisputed??You need to file an Answer by ))((issue date plus 37 days)) ((isDisputed??You can do this by filling out the paper form D8B and posting to the court. The address is on the form.))

((isUndisputed??The applicant can apply for a conditional order from ))((issue date plus 141 days))((isUndisputed??.))

View the latest status and documents associated with this case: ((signin url))

Divorce and Dissolution
HM Courts & Tribunals Service
divorcecase@justice.gov.uk
0300 303 0642 (Monday to Friday, 8am to 6pm)

Your feedback helps improve this service for others: https://www.smartsurvey.co.uk/s/Divorce_Feedback/?pageurl=/email.
subject: You have responded: ((reference number))
